body: the realalistic invitable ending is mass murder. even if the girls themselves are too weak and helpless, there's bound to be a simp like me among all those men that will flip out and just slit the throats of the leaders in their sleep eventially, set a few houses on fire or such.

It's just too much to ask for one of these damn rape stories to end with a positive ending isn't it? I don't want the slave ending anymore. Wish there were more like Space Pirate Sara, Hell Knight Ingrid, and Armored Knight Iris.
